_comment: BREAKOUT Pipeline Configuration - All values from configuration.json and pro Indian trading standards
_description: Momentum breaks of key levels (ORB, flag continuation, squeeze release, etc.)

time_windows._comment: From configuration.json time_policy - NSE trading hours

first_hour_momentum._comment: FHM screening config - PRO STANDARD: RVOL>=2.0x indicates institutional activity

triggers.min_rvol_comment: PRO: RVOL>2x indicates possible big move (institutional). Was 1.5x - too low per industry research.

stop_loss._rationale: WIDENED: 0.8%->1.2% based on 1m bar simulation. Avg MAE was 0.53%, tight SL hit on recoverable moves.

adx._orb_early_comment: ORB EARLY WINDOW FIX: Pro traders use relaxed ADX (15) for early ORB because ADX takes 14+ bars to stabilize
adx._fhm_note: FHM bypasses ADX - uses RVOL-based momentum (RVOL >= 2x is the signal)

chop._comment: DATA-DRIVEN (Dec 2024): ORB CHOP winners have 283k volume vs losers 107k (+164%), winners have srr 1.28 vs losers 2.28 (-44%)
chop._orb_chop_evidence: Filter vol>=150k AND srr<1.8: 54 trades, 64.8% WR, +5,190 Rs. Turns -8,404 Rs loser into +5,190 Rs winner. Improvement: +13,594 Rs

squeeze._comment: DATA-DRIVEN: 55.6% of winning longs came from squeeze regime. BOOSTED from 0.9 to 1.2 for longs.

validated_filters._comment: CROSS-RUN VALIDATED FILTERS (Dec 2024) - Consistent across backtest_20251204 and backtest_20251205

first_hour_momentum_long._comment: DATA-DRIVEN (Dec 2024): Block large_cap (25% WR, -Rs 3608). Max ADX 25 (ADX<25: 67% WR, +Rs 2091)
first_hour_momentum_long._evidence: 26 trades total. large_cap: 25% WR -Rs 3608. mid_cap: 62% WR +Rs 3000. ADX<25: 67% WR +Rs 2091. ADX>=35: 33% WR -Rs 2166.

breakout_long_hour_11._evidence: R1: +1,695 Rs (91 trades) | R2: +1,554 Rs (92 trades) - 11AM breakouts have low WR, momentum fades

long_trade_volume._evidence: Winners have 2x volume (213k vs 107k). Min 150k improves long trade quality

orb_breakout_long_cap_filter._comment: DATA-DRIVEN (Dec 2024): Large cap 92% WR vs mid/small 43% WR

mid_cap_with_filters._note: structural_rr = vol_ratio * breakout_strength / normalized_risk. Winners avg 1.62, losers avg 1.84. Use 1.5 as min to filter weakest setups.

orb_breakout_long_cap_filter._evidence: Large cap: 13 trades, 92% WR, +4,898 Rs. Mid+small: 32 trades, 43% WR, -563 Rs. Mid cap salvageable with strength>=0.7 + entry>=35min (80% WR, 5 trades, +1,046 Rs)

long_specific_filters._comment: DATA-DRIVEN (Dec 2024): Filters specific to long trades based on winner/loser analysis

rsi_max._evidence: RSI>=70: 9.3% WR (7W/75T). RSI<60: 16.4% WR (32W/195T). High RSI = chasing exhausted moves.

squeeze_regime_boost._evidence: 55.6% of winning longs came from squeeze regime vs only 20% from trend_up.

max_hold_minutes._evidence: Pro ORB traders hold 30-90 min max. After 2 hours, momentum fades. Time-based exit if no T1 hit.

setup_filters._comment: MODERATE PROFILE FILTERS (Dec 2024): Optimized for ~23K trades, 94% ROI at Rs 3L capital

breakout_long._evidence: ELIMINATION Dec 2024: 14 trades, Rs 127 net avg (was 1,211 trades, Rs -107 net)

first_hour_momentum_long._evidence: ELIMINATION Dec 2024: 22 trades, Rs 106 net avg (was 2,234 trades, Rs -197 net)

orb_breakout_long._evidence: MODERATE: Rs -120K loss, 1541 trades - block entirely

squeeze_release_long._evidence: OPTION A Dec 2024: ADX 25-30 (Rs 702 net), RSI 70+ blocked (Rs -31 net). 45 trades remain profitable.

break_of_structure_long._reason: NOT SALVAGEABLE - all filter combos negative
break_of_structure_long._evidence: ELIMINATION Dec 2024: 64 trades, Rs -345 net - no profitable combo found

global_filters._comment: UNIFIED GLOBAL FILTERS - Applied to all setups before setup-specific filters

long_min_volume._rationale: Longs need minimum institutional volume (FHM bypasses this)

rsi_dead_zone._rationale: Disabled for breakout - momentum can start from any RSI level

specialized_filters._comment: Complex filters requiring specialized logic (kept in validate_gates() code)

orb_cap_filter_with_mid_cap_conditions._note: mid_cap allowed if structural_rr >= 1.5 AND entry_minute >= 35

fhm_bypass._note: FHM bypasses volume, ADX, RSI checks - uses RVOL from screening

orb_relaxed_thresholds._note: ORB uses relaxed ADX (15) and RSI thresholds - market open volatility

ranking._comment: BREAKOUT-SPECIFIC RANKING (Dec 2024) - Pro trader research: high ADX, neutral RSI, VWAP aligned critical
ranking._score_scale_note: Multiplier to scale weighted sum back to usable range (~0-5). Weighted sum alone produces ~0.17 mean.

volume._comment: CRITICAL for breakouts - volume confirms breakout validity

rsi._comment: NEUTRAL = GOOD for breakouts (room to run, not overbought/oversold)

adx._comment: HIGH ADX = GOOD for breakouts (strong trend confirms momentum)

vwap._comment: ALIGNED = CRITICAL for breakouts (momentum in direction of VWAP)

distance._comment: Less critical for breakouts - already broken out from level

squeeze._comment: Squeeze release = good for breakouts (pent-up energy)

acceptance._comment: KEEP for breakouts - structural R:R matters for momentum plays

breakout._comment: Breakout poor in chop per baseline report

break_of_structure._comment: From baseline: 1.2 constant for structural shifts

first_hour_momentum._comment: FHM: High multipliers across all regimes - momentum trumps regime in first hour

entry._comment: WIDENED (Dec 2024): zone_mult_atr 0.25->0.4, min_zone_pct 0.20->0.25. flag_continuation had 0.31% zones -> 0 triggers.

targets._comment: DATA-DRIVEN (Dec 2024): FHM 1m simulation showed 1.2% SL + 1.5R T1 = +348% improvement. Higher T1 captures momentum.

long._comment: RAISED: T1 1.0R→1.5R for longs. FHM 1m simulation: 55 trades, Rs 1,886 baseline → Rs 8,451 with 1.5R.

short._comment: Shorts keep 1.5R T1 - they have 1.13R avg MFE vs 0.74R for longs

qty_splits._comment: 70-30 split - DATA-DRIVEN: Higher T1 exit due to high hard SL rate (~41%)

caps._comment: FIXED: max_pct was 1.0 (1%) - way too restrictive! Old config uses 100%. Targets need to reach 2-3R for positive expectancy.

orb_target_recalculation._comment: Pro ORB traders (Toby Crabel, Mark Fisher) use OR range for targets. Recalculated at trigger time based on actual entry.
orb_target_recalculation._evidence: OR-based targets are achievable within normal ORB price action. R-multiples can push targets too far when actual entry differs from planned entry.

rsi_penalty._comment: BREAKOUT: Penalize weak momentum (low RSI for longs, high RSI for shorts)
rsi_penalty._orb_early_comment: ORB EARLY WINDOW FIX: Pro traders use relaxed RSI thresholds for early ORB because RSI is erratic at market open
